Net proceeds will be used for general corporate  purposes. Fitch currently rates Time Warner Long-Term 'BBB+' Issuer Default  Rating (IDR) with a Stable Outlook. The company had approximately $23.7 billion  of debt outstanding as of March 31  2016. The i

column4: Toyota sees China sales on target  aided by cut in inventories  tax
column5: BEIJING Toyota   which on Friday posted a 9.2 percent rise in China April sales  is on course to meet its full-year sales target for the world's largest auto market  driven by lower retail inventories and a tax cut on small-engine cars  company officials said.

column4: Toyota posts 9.2 pct rise in April China sales
column5: BEIJING May 6 Toyota Motor Corp  announced on Friday a 9.2 percent year-on-year increase in China sales for April to about 101 100 vehicles  which came after a 40.6 percent jump for March and reflected a slightly-better-than-expected sentiment in the world's largest auto market.

column4: Machinist union recommends strike at Triumph over contract offer
